prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Bass, Synth Lead, Piano, Brass, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Bass, Synth Lead, Piano, Brass - this song has it all, but no Drums.

Style 2:
No Drums, but this song still has plenty of musical flavor with Guitar, Bass, Synth Lead, Piano, and Brass.

Style 3:
This composition features Guitar, Bass, Synth Lead, Piano, and Brass - all without the addition of Drums.
